item.title: Center
item.description: Why “Center” instead of “Centre”? Well, that’s because “center” is the version used in CSS. There were moments in my life when I wanted to give up writing in British English. There are so many other people using American English… except for me. Programming languages are expressed using American English as well. I felt like a rebel for naming my variables in British English, but that’s what I’ve learnt in school.
